mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Reality! Join us and unlock a world of limitless indulgence today!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into my Bank of Entitlement branch, expecting the royal treatment. But what do I see? A line! A line of peasants daring to waste my precious time. I throw my designer sunglasses off in a fit of rage, causing a dramatic gasp to ripple through the room. "How dare you make me wait like some commoner?!" I bellowed, as I demand they open a new express lane just for me. And you know what? They did! That's the power of entitlement, my friends.
